title: Flowers in jungle? Really?
body:
How much people think this flower in jungle are so bad? Why riot wanna destroy this game...a lot of people unnistall this game cause this..
Do not exist something to vote our uptade's..if we want or not this ''beatifull flower''.

replies.body: I hope they taken out..i think Shaclone will unnistall this game cause this flowers.
Shaclone is also toxic, but I sincerely hope you're not learning that from him too.

i get it people dont like change... but how harmful would plants be ?

to me its a gimmick
I like the idea and concept, but not the randomness, hope that gets looked into before pre-season ends.
how is it random? the spawn 90-110 seconds and in predetermine locations that you can see before the spawn

Oh didn't know they changed that, though it was still random.

So the plants are always revealed on the map? like jungle camps?
where else should the plants grow? jungle seems like the right environment for them
then how about we grow berries in the bush, the drake should land on a platform surrounded by deep water (slow), flash charges for every other champ thats not an assasin to match it

I'm think Riot is actually going to listen to the feedback on the plants. A huge amount of pro players are not supportive of the plants. I think they'll test them in the preseason and they'll be taken out when they hear the negative feedback.
If anyone uninstalls over flowers, it is a case of "nothing of value was lost". Maybe 3 people and a couple worthless noobs (just using it as an excuse to cry) will.
